price: Rwose turabakuriraho ibihano mu gihe gito, kandi nta kabuza muzongera musubire (mu buhakanyi).
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
